channel.title: Server already in use
channel.description:
i keep getting the error that my server is already in use,
when i attempt to get online i get an error stating the server is already in use. This is the deltascape source offered by delta himself.
I figured out how to take off the anti-leech.
i portforwarded using utorrent.
i compiled everything and im attempting to run the server when it comes up with the message of the century "server is already in use"
how can i come about this?

item.title: Server already in use
item.dc:creator: @Olzax Olzax
item.description:
@Olzax wrote:

trivenge:

first guy helped out thanks to him

welcome, i had the same problem when i used utorrent as portforwarding

Read full topic

item.title: Server already in use

item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

I know. no problems

item.title: Server already in use
item.dc:creator: @trivenge trivenge
item.description:
@trivenge wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:5, topic:235577”]Yea but the rules state you cant reveal your servers ip even that is classified as “advertising” just letting you know for future reference.

And your allowed to have your ip in your sig.

also im pretty aware of what your doing. and you took it out so i have no problem.[/quote][quote=“ziplock, post:5, topic:235577”]Yea but the rules state you cant reveal your servers ip even that is classified as “advertising” just letting you know for future reference.

And your allowed to have your ip in your sig.

also im pretty aware of what your doing. and you took it out so i have no problem.[/quote]

i was just asking for help

Read full topic

item.title: Server already in use
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Yea but the rules state you cant reveal your servers ip even that is classified as “advertising” just letting you know for future reference.

And your allowed to have your ip in your sig.

also im pretty aware of what your doing. and you took it out so i have no problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Server already in use
item.dc:creator: @trivenge trivenge
item.description:
@trivenge wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:3, topic:235577”]You have a program that is using the same port as the server. Change the port that the server runs on or exit the program interfering.

P.S
take your server’s ip off or i will report for advertising.[/quote]

thanks for your help, first guy helped out thanks to him

but i was not advertising i was merely showing the ip to see if maybe it was a problem, but i see you have no dignity or remorse towards others problems. If you want to report me, feel free too, but i will keep this here stating that it was for intentional purposes of server development and not advertising. I do not intend to run this server online. In fact i am making a brand new source. Please do not judge too hastily when you have no clue what the person is doing.

As for advertising, it seems your signature is advertising is it not?

Read full topic

item.title: Server already in use
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

You have a program that is using the same port as the server. Change the port that the server runs on or exit the program interfering.

P.S
take your server’s ip off or i will report for advertising.

Read full topic

item.title: Server already in use
item.dc:creator: @Olzax Olzax
item.description:
@Olzax wrote:

[quote=“trivenge, post:1, topic:235577”]i keep getting the error that my server is already in use, i have the ip realmscape.no-ip.info

when i attempt to get online i get an error stating the server is already in use. This is the deltascape source offered by delta himself.

I figured out how to take off the anti-leech.

i portforwarded using utorrent.

i compiled everything and im attempting to run the server when it comes up with the message of the century
“server is already in use”

how can i come about this?[/quote]
you must exit utorrent, run the runserver.bat and then open utorrent

Read full topic
